```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
sim <- 2

filename <- paste0(
  'Spatial_Pandemic Sim',
  sim,
  '-table.csv'
)
```

```{r}
raw_data <-
  read_csv(filename,skip=6) %>% 
  rename(
    run_number = `[run number]`,
    step = `[step]`
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(
    run_number,
    step
  ) %>%
  select(-c(
    max_memory,
    awareness,
    transmissibility,
    removal,
    `fear?`,
    radius,
    information,
    population,
    memory_distribution
  ))

raw_data
```


```{r}
converged_data <-
  raw_data %>% 
  group_by(run_number) %>% 
  filter(step == max(step)) %>% 
  ungroup

converged_data
```

```{r}
runs <-
  raw_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(s_count,i_count,r_count,incidences),
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(name))

runs
```

```{r}
fig0 <-
  ggplot(
  data = converged_data,
  mapping = aes(
    x = s_count,
    group = fear_strength,
    color = as.factor(fear_strength), fill = as.factor(fear_strength)
  ) 
) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = .5,bins = 20,position = 'identity') +
  labs(
    title = 'Figure 2.0',
    subtitle = 'Endpoint Distribution',
    caption = 'Local information leads to greater success.'
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
      name = '% Susceptible by Convergence'
  ) +
  scale_color_discrete(name = 'Fear Strength') + scale_fill_discrete(name = 'Fear Strength') +
  theme(legend.position = 'left')

fig0 
```


```{r}
ggsave(
  filename = paste0('Fig ',sim,'0.svg'),
  plot=fig0,
  device = 'svg',
  width = 3.9,
  height=2.4,
  units='in'
  )
```


```{r}
fig1 <-
  ggplot(
  data = filter(runs,name != 'incidences',run_number <= 100,step<=500),
  mapping = aes(
    x = step,
    y = value,
    color = name,
    group = interaction(run_number,name)
  )
) + 
  geom_line(alpha = .05) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c('red','blue','green'),
    labels = c('Infectious','Recovered','Susceptible')
  ) +
  labs(
    title = paste0('Figure ',sim,'.1'),
    subtitle = 'Compartmental Dynamics',
    caption = 'As before, the compartments behave linearly.'
  ) +
  guides(colour = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1))) +
  theme(legend.position = 'left')

fig1
```
```{r}
ggsave(
  filename = paste0('Fig ',sim,'1.svg'),
  plot=fig1,
  device = 'svg',
  width = 3.9,
  height=2.4,
  units='in'
  )
```


```{r}
fig2 <-
  ggplot(
  data = filter(
    runs,
    name == 'incidences',
    run_number == 100,
    fear_strength == 5,
    step <= 500
    ),
  mapping = aes(
    x = step,
    y = value,
    group = run_number
  )
) + 
  geom_smooth(color = 'black',method = 'gam',se=0) +
  geom_point(alpha = 1) +
  labs(
    title = paste0('Figure ',sim,'.2'),
    subtitle = 'Incidence Curve'
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(name = 'Incidences')

fig2
```



```{r}
ggsave(
  filename = paste0('Fig ',sim,'2.svg'),
  plot=fig2,
  device = 'svg',
  width = 3.9,
  height=2.4,
  units='in'
  )
```
